title: Bulls can fly
author: VD
content_html: This chart is the sort of indicator that inspires me to construct phrases such as “larger in scale and scope”. Notice that the P/E ratios are significantly higher than they were prior to the 2000 crash.
content_text: This chart is the sort of indicator that inspires me to construct phrases such as “larger in scale and scope”.  Notice that the P/E ratios are significantly higher than they were prior to the 2000 crash.
